settings.image_banner_title_text: LAOLI transports its collectors to a sweeter, better-than-real world, offering casually elegant pieces that reconnect you with who you are.

Founded by creative director and designer Olivia Ball, LAOLI was created for the aesthetes of the world who celebrate the fine things in life. A delicate balance between sophistication and ease, our pieces embrace refinement, poise and the poetic in equal measure.
